root.title: venezuela reveal debt payment schedul detail
root.body: 20.3 billion dlr debt reschedul accord venezuela sign week ago reduc payment next three year 64 pct accord financ ministri figur releas weekend ministri statist analysi say origin accord call payment 3.82 billion dlr 1987 1989 new agreement requir debt servic 1.35 billion period 1987 venezuela requir pay 250 mln dlr instead 1.55 billion origin agre payment 1988 cut 400 mln 1.20 billion 1989 700 mln 1.11 billion ministri analysi say reduct debt servic 1987 1989 amount effect grace period someth venezuelan negoti sought creditor bank grant reschedul fall 1994 1998 53.3 pct 11.25 billion dlr must paid februari 27 accord venezuela repay 20.3 billion dlr public sector debt 14 year 7/8 percentag point london interbank offer rate libor compar februari 1986 accord call 12 year term interest 1 1/8 point libor
